data.title: Covid Roundup: AstraZeneca Reports Positive Covid-19 Vaccine Data; Moderna Inks New Supply Deal
data.text: AstraZeneca posted positive interim Phase 2 testing data on its Covid-19 vaccine candidate in older adults, while Moderna inked a supply contract with Qatar, as MRNA stock, AZN stock rose. The post Covid Roundup: AstraZeneca Reports Positive Covid-19 Vaccine Data; Moderna Inks New Supply Deal appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: What's the Best Way to Invest in Coronavirus Vaccine Stocks?
Moderna Announces Supply Agreement with the Ministry of Public Health to Supply Qatar with mRNA Vaccine Against COVID-19 (mRNA-1273)
data.text: CAMBRIDGE, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Moderna announces supply agreement with the Ministry of Public Health to supply Qatar with mRNA vaccine against COVID-19 (mRNA-1273)
